quote: I'll go out with you if you want

quote: Where on earth would you find such a hot fifty year old

quote: To the me back then, you don't need to worry. You'll soon find something you can do, something you can set your heart on

quote: I’m scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing

quote: When we started the light music club we said that our slogan was going to be “Budokan or bust!” We worked after school jobs together so I could buy Geeta. We had tea in the club room together and talked about everything. We had training camps at Mugi-chan’s summer homes and looked for a new student who would join the club. I can’t really say we devoted our selves wholeheartedly to practicing, but right now, for us standing here on this stage this auditorium is our Budokan, and we’ll sing our hearts out to the very end!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I’ll be waiting for you to get your asses back here!

author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: Would something like that make her feel better… OH, IT DID!

quote: Get real. I’m not a baby you know. I can’t let my self freak out over every little thing forever
